content: 5 reconnect the pieces to knit in the round again and work 8 more rounds in stockinette step 6 for the ribbing work k2 p2 across the round continue for 36 rounds or 10 cm / 4 in of 2x2 ribbing then finish with a 2x2 tubular bind-off step 7 using short double-pointed needles pick up approximately 22 stitches around the thumb opening begin at the middle of the bottom edge and work clock- wise around the opening step 8 german short row to form the thumb on 4mm needles row 2 knit 14 stitches then turn your work row 3 make a double stitch purl 4 stitches and turn row 4 make a double stitch knit past the previous double stitch by 3 stitches and turn row 5 make a double stitch purl past the previous double stitch by 3 stitches and turn repeat row 4 and 5 until all stitches are picked up step 9 continue in stockinette for 14 rounds before binding off finishing weave in all ends wash and block your mittens 3
